MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 10:58 am in the LL65 postcode area of South Stack following reports of a grounded overhead cable. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers have arrived on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We now expect power to be restored by 4:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:53 pm on 27th October, 2020.
